articles.description: Australia would appear to be in the box seat to host the 2027 Rugby World Cup with attention now turning to who will be at the Wallabies’ helm come the showpiece tournament.
articles.content:
Then he added, significantly. The next six weeks will be quite defining.
Australia has pursued a home World Cup with rare vigour, even forming a Distinguished Persons committee to allow such luminar… [+2536 chars]
